seo.title: Sofazelle - Your Online Marketplace for Cozy Living

hero.description: Explore our unique collection of products designed to enhance your cozy living experience.

items.question: What is Sofazelle?
items.answer: Sofazelle is your go-to online marketplace for cozy and comfortable lifestyle products.

items.question: How can I place an order?
items.answer: Simply browse our collection, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout.

items.question: What is your return policy?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy on all items. Please check our return page for details.
